page.title: 14SPECIAL OLYMPICS
page.content: IN 1976 THE FIRST SPECIAL OLYMPICS WERE HELD HERE IN GLOUCESTER. EUNICE KENNEDY SHRIVER STARTED IT. THE SPECIAL OLYMPICS ARE HELD EVERY FOUR YEARS. THE NEXT SPECIAL OLYMPICS WILL BE HELD IN THE STATES IN 1987. ALL THE MENTALLY AND PHYSICALLY HANDICAPPED WILL BE TAKING PART IN THIS SPECIAL OLYMPICS IN TWO YEARS TIME. THEY WILL TAKE PART IN ALL ACTIVITIES AS WE DO,SUCH AS JUMPING,RUNNING,SWIMMING ETC. IT WILL BE HELD IN AMERICA. THEY WILL NEED LOTS OF HELP WHEN THEY ARE MOVING FROM ONE SPORT TO ANOTHER BUT WHEN THEY ARE DOING RUNNING OR SOME SPORT THEY HAVE NO HELP AT ALL. CHRIS MALONEY, COACH AT GLOUCESTER LEISURE CENTRE IS THE CHIEF COACH IN BRITAIN.
